mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(EVENT_START, 'yyyy-mm-dd') FROM S_CALENDAR WHERE STUDY_NO = #{value} and EVENT_START < sysdate ORDER BY EVENT_START desc
SELECT USER_ID as id, (select user_name from user_info where user_id = STUDY_MANAGEMENT.user_id) as name FROM STUDY_MANAGEMENT WHERE STUDY_NO = #{value} order by name asc
mapper.insert: insert into S_ROLLBOOK (RB_NO, STUDY_NO, RB_NAME, RB_ATTEND_DAY, RB_ATTEND, RB_NOTE, RB_WRITE_DAY, RB_WRITER) values (#{no}, #{studyNo}, #{name}, #{attendDay}, #{attend}, #{note}, sysdate, 'cj')
mapper.select: select count(*) count from S_ROLLBOOK where study_no = #{studyNo} and RB_name = #{name} and RB_ATTEND = 'attend' and S_ROLLBOOK.RB_ATTEND_DAY < sysdate
